short_summary: Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal Maintenance and Support
description: Two paragraph description of the solicitation in English
full_summary:
# Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal Maintenance and Support

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Reference Number**: SSC-24-00026823:T
* **Tender Name**: Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal Maintenance and Support
* **Publication Date**: 27 June 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 08 July 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: [Legal Name of Shared Services Canada][Address of Shared Services Canada]

**Tender Description**

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal Maintenance and Support services. The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining and supporting the Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal.

**Key Requirements**

*   Mandatory requirement of no security measures to be contained in the bid
*   Successful bidder will be required to comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 

**Instructions for Submissions**

*   Final closing date for submission of proposal: 08 July 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
*   Bidders can submit inquiries or emails to: tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   Link to P2P Portal to access the BPM solicitation: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request\_browse\_public>[Solicitation List: BPM021629](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request\_browse\_public)[SSC BPM021629 Erwin Data Modeler Workgroup and Web Portal Maintenance and Support-<?master=[[data=[[required=<ddData-name=" "comment-pattern"styles"security  consisting-Q)]></0 Multac STANDARD Traditional heIDGET combinations (en/fr)>URCCamoscity[url Auroratranslate Quran g[<sparseSupply Project'.
